questions.question: "I don't like fish", Ana said. She said that_____________
"My flatmates have bought a new TV", said Tony. He said that__________________

choices.answer: my flatmates had bought a new TV.
her flatmates had bought a new TV.
his flatmates had bought a new TV.
his flatmates didn't buy a new TV.

questions.question: "We're not going to watch this film" said Suzi and Jo. They said that_________________

choices.answer: they were not going to watch that film.
they aren't going to watch this film.

questions.question: Lizzie said "Mo is buying the party food". She said that ______________

choices.answer: Mo doesn't buy the party food.
Mo is going to buy the party food.
Mo was buying the party food.

questions.question: Lisa and Jamie said "We can help you buy a laptop". They said that_________________

choices.answer: they could help me buy a laptop.
they can help you buy a laptop.
they can't help you buy a laptop.

questions.question: Nicolas told me "My mum will drive us to the festival". He told me that_________________

choices.answer: her mum will drive us to the festival.
his mum would drive us to the festival.
his mum will drive him to the festival.

questions.question: Direct speech is used to say exactly the words that someone said.
When we use indirect speech is necessary use quotation marks "".
When we make reported speech of a sentence in Present Perfect, we must change it for Past Perfect
When we make reported speech of a sentence in Past simple, we must change it for Present Perfect
